articles.title: Webb Telescope looks at most distant star ever detected, twice as hot as Sun - India Today
articles.description: Earendel, a massive B-type star, is more than twice as hot as our sun and about a million times more luminous. The star's detection was made possible due to gravitational lensing.
articles.content:
